channel.title: Linux dedicated
channel.description:
Can someone just tell me how to run a runescape server off my linux machine? I know how to on windows... Just I need to know if I need to set mysql up or ssh and what commands to type, I already installed java on it just cant seem to get run.sh to work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 09:25:25 AM[/size][hr]This is what it shows in my putty root
[root@shoutcast elite]# cd /jdk1.6.0_04/bin/elite [root@shoutcast elite]# chmod +X run.sh [root@shoutcast elite]# chmod +X compile.sh [root@shoutcast elite]# ./run.sh : bad interpreter: No such file or directory

item.title: Linux dedicated
item.dc:creator: @kentos123 kentos123
item.description:
@kentos123 wrote:

Can someone just tell me how to run a runescape server off my linux machine?
I know how to on windowsâ€¦
Just I need to know if I need to set mysql up or ssh and what commands to type, I already installed java on it just cant seem to get run.sh to work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 09:25:25 AM[/size][hr]This is what it shows in my putty root

[root@shoutcast elite]# cd /jdk1.6.0_04/bin/elite

[root@shoutcast elite]# chmod +X compile.sh
[root@shoutcast elite]# ./run.sh
: bad interpreter: No such file or directory
